QuestData.Title: Scalps!
QuestData.Description: I thinkin' it be time to do some scalpin', mon!$B$BThe trolls at Heb'Drakkar to the northeast should do nicely. With their fancy bats and attackin' us, they got it comin'!$B$BAhunae even give you his own knife so that you do the job right.
QuestData.LogDescription: Scalper Ahunae at Zim'Torga wants you to use Ahunae's Knife to scalp 10 Heb'Drakkar trolls.$B$BThe scalper reminds you that you should loot them first.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ahunae know there be no way that $n scalped that many of the Heb'Drakkar so quickly!
QuestData.RewardText: Aw, me thinkin' that too funny.$B$B$n is my kind of $r!$B$BYou still got my knife?
